description:

Fixes issue 4505.

Thanks. Have you already checked there's no other case?

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 5:50 PM, Mikio Hara <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> Thanks. Have you already checked there's no other case?

Sorry, I didn't know that Russ smashed old cases already.

> LGTM
> 
> On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 5:50 PM, Mikio Hara <mailto:mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:
